title: Agroforestry System
description: Integrate trees and shrubs into our farms to boost biodiversity, improve soil, and create sustainable ecosystems.

title: Ecological Farming
description: Use organic methods to reduce environmental impact, support pest control, and ensure fertile soils.

title: Regenerative Cultivation
description: Restore soils, store carbon, and harmonize with nature to create thriving ecosystems.

title: Outdoor Education
description: Offer workshops on sustainable farming, environmental care, and solidarity agriculture.

title: Endangered Livestock Breeds
description: Preserve rare breeds to protect genetic diversity and promote sustainable farming practices.

title: Vegetables and Herbs
description: Cultivate and manage diverse produce to ensure quality, enhance flavors, and support nutrition.
